data.comment: 1000 spectators are watching the match in Bergamo.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick Atalanta.
In the minute 3, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Cagliari.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Atalanta take a 1-0 lead thanks to Luis Muriel.
That's a fine assist from Jose Luis Palomino.
Throw-in for Atalanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 11, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta just outside Cagliari's area.
Luis Muriel of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 15, Atalanta's Duvan Zapata gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Atalanta drive upfield and Marten De Roon gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Atalanta.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Atalanta's Luis Muriel attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 22, Marten De Roon (Atalanta) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Mario Pasalic for Atalanta drives towards goal at Gewiss Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 24, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Diego Godin equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Razvan Marin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 26, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Cagliari's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 28, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Goal! Papu Gomez gives Atalanta a 2-1 lead in Bergamo.
Duvan Zapata with an assist there.
In the minute 30, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In Bergamo, Razvan Marin of Cagliari is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 33, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hans Hateboer's header is off-target for Atalanta.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Cagliari are coming forward and Marko Rog gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Atalanta take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Mario Pasalic.
Great play from Robin Gosens to set up the goal.
In the minute 38, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Atalanta throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atalanta.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Atalanta in the half of Cagliari.
Goal! Atalanta extend their lead to 4-1 through Duvan Zapata.
Jose Luis Palomino instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
Throw-in Atalanta.
In the minute 45, Fabrizio Pasqua awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Fabrizio Pasqua will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Gewiss Stadium.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Cagliari at Gewiss Stadium.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Cagliari are pushing forward but Giovanni Simeone's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
In the minute 51, Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atalanta's Duvan Zapata is on target but unsuccessful.
Atalanta pushes forward through Luis Muriel, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 52, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Atalanta's Cristian Romero goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Joao Pedro strikes to reduce the deficit to 4-2 at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 52, That's a fine assist from Babis Lykogiannis.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Atalanta throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Cagliari's Giovanni Simeone misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Joao Pedro (Cagliari) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 56, Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Atalanta.
Joao Pedro (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 60, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Gewiss Stadium.
Duvan Zapata of Atalanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Atalanta are caught offside.
The home team have replaced Duvan Zapata with Sam Lammers. This is the first substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Ruslan Malinovskyi is on a sub for Papu Gomez for Atalanta.
Throw-in Cagliari.
In the minute 66, The away team replace Razvan Marin with Matteo Tramoni.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Cagliari are pushing forward but Matteo Tramoni's finish is wide of the goal.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Remo Freuler is replacing Luis Muriel for the home team.
Gian Piero Gasperini is making the team's fourth substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Johan Mojica replacing Robin Gosens.
In the minute 75, Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a shot on goal at Gewiss Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 78, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a second substitution, with Fabrizio Caligara replacing Riccardo Sottil.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 80, Cagliari drives forward and Nahitan Nandez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal! Sam Lammers extends Atalanta's lead to 5-2.
Mario Pasalic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 83, Remo Freuler (Atalanta) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Bergamo.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 85, Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
Atalanta make their fifth substitution with Bosko Sutalo replacing Jose Luis Palomino.
Ragnar Klavan is replacing Diego Godin for Cagliari at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 85, Eusebio Di Francesco is making the team's fourth substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Paolo Farago replacing Gabriele Zappa.
In Bergamo, Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
The away team replace Joao Pedro with Leonardo Pavoletti.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Ruslan Malinovskyi of Atalanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi is whistled for offside at Gewiss Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Bergamo.
Ruslan Malinovskyi for Atalanta gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Cagliari a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 5-2.
